description: Digital Object Identifier for the record.
Institution string if provided by the depositor.
Issued date (may be null for preprints).
Raw authors array as JSON string.
All license blocks as JSON string.
Number of references in this work.
Times this work is cited (Crossref view).
Semicolon‑separated DOIs of preprints for a published work.
Semicolon‑separated DOIs of other versions of the same work.
URL of the publisher’s update policy.
Group title used by some servers.
Crossref member ID for the depositor.
Abstract in raw JATS/XML if present.
